posts.content:
My bus is coming along nicely right now, heading towards MOT at end of april

Plan was to get gearbox in this weekend, but forgot to get a digital angle finder from work to set the CE adjustable spring plates. So has anyone got a pic or measurement that will allow me to fit them roughly correct until I can measure them properly next week and get them level

Cheers

Tony
Check the fitting instructions ! Tells you how to get them set up from scratch
you can download a digital inclinometer app relatively easily onto your mobile phone if you got a smart phone

I could only find the IRS instructions which give a measurement of 12mm to bottom of spring plate, will go with that for now and I'll check the app'

Thanks

Tony
